subject.topic: Land titles -- Registration and transfer -- Tennessee -- Davidson County.
Frontier and pioneer life --Tennessee -- Davidson County.

mods.note: This land record dates from the early settlement days of Middle Tennessee, when the region was part of North Carolina. It describes the holding as land lying on Mill Creek in what is now Davidson County, Tennessee. The document describes the proximity to the French Licks, as well as various springs on the property. This is one of a series of almost 70 land records signed by Samuel Barton during the 1780s in Davidson County in the collection.
The University of Tennessee Libraries (Knoxville, Tennessee) is the digital publisher.
